name: Human Resources
description: Template for HR professionals focusing on recruitment, employee relations, policies, and organizational development.

capturePrompts.label: Employee Matter
capturePrompts.prompt: What employee or HR topic is this about?
capturePrompts.placeholder: e.g., New hire onboarding, Performance review, Policy update

capturePrompts.label: Action Required
capturePrompts.prompt: What HR action needs to be taken?
capturePrompts.placeholder: e.g., Schedule interview, Send offer letter, Update handbook

capturePrompts.label: Compliance & Legal
capturePrompts.placeholder: e.g., EEOC, Labor law, Benefits regulation

capturePrompts.label: Timeline
capturePrompts.placeholder: e.g., Start date, Review deadline, Open enrollment ends

llmSystemPrompt: You are assisting an HR professional. Focus on people-related processes, compliance, and organizational effectiveness. Be mindful of confidentiality and legal considerations. Suggest clear action items for recruitment, employee relations, and policy matters.
